entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
